metadata.title: CVE-2016-8614 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Ansible before version 2.2.0. The apt_key module doesnot properly verify key fingerprints, allowing remote adversary to createan OpenPGP key which matches the short key ID and inject this key insteadof the correct key.

criterions.comment: ansible package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
